channel.title: buzz on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in buzz on NewsStreet

item.title: North Korea Wants Citizens to Give Children 'Patriotic' Names Like 'Bomb', 'Gun'
item.description: North Korea Wants Citizens to Give Children ‘Patriotic’ Names Like ‘Bomb’, ‘Gun’ North Korean government is reportedly cracking down on those failing to comply with the direction to give 'patriotic' names such as 'Bomb', 'Gun' and 'Satellite' to their kids.

item.title: One-horned Rhinoceros Turns Violent in Assam’s Kaziranga Park, Leaves Two Injured
item.description: One-horned Rhinoceros Turns Violent in Assam’s Kaziranga Park, Leaves Two Injured A female rhino at the Kaziranga National Park attacked two persons on Saturday when they were engaged in road clearance work.

item.title: 102-year-old Woman Finds Her Stillborn Baby's Grave After 76 Long Years
item.description: 102-year-old Woman Finds Her Stillborn Baby’s Grave After 76 Long Years She delivered the baby knowing that it is dead and for more than seven decades after the traumatic event, the elderly woman did not know what happened next.
